Test of (destructive) SCO colour rendering.
SCO fg: [=0F0[=7F [=1F1[=7F [=2F2[=7F [=3F3[=7F [=4F4[=7F [=5F5[=7F [=6F6[=7F [=7F7[=7F [=8F8[=7F [=9F9[=7F [=10F10[=7F [=11F11[=7F [=12F12[=7F [=13F13[=7F [=14F14[=7F [=15F15[=7F
SCO bg: [=0G0[=0G [=1G1[=0G [=2G2[=0G [=3G3[=0G [=4G4[=0G [=5G5[=0G [=6G6[=0G [=7G7[=0G [=8G8[=0G [=9G9[=0G [=10G10[=0G [=11G11[=0G [=12G12[=0G [=13G13[=0G [=14G14[=0G [=15G15[=0G
